item.title: How to compile and run code under C programming
item.description: Go to the terminal Creat a folder for the task. Create the filename with extension code .c as follows vi file_name.c Once the file is completed, then compile the file as follows gcc file_name.c -o compiled_file_name The compiled code will be accessible via compiled_file_name then run to programm by issuing the following command. ./compiled_file_name
